    • handleEntityCollision

      protected void handleEntityCollision(Entity entity)
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Handle entity collision performs routines when an entity collides with another entity. The routine is different for each entity. The method is abstract and must be implemented by the subclasses.
      Specified by:
      handleEntityCollision in class Entity
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity
